name: FABRICIO TRINDADE
title: Full Stack • Web Development
summary: Computer Science student with a strong foundation in programming logic and hands-on experience building web applications and APIs. Familiar with cloud fundamentals, system troubleshooting, and structured problem-solving. Seeking an internship focused on cloud infrastructure, monitoring, and automation, with emphasis on clean architecture and ATS-friendly documentation.

projects.title: Full Stack Web Application
bullets: Designed and implemented a full stack web application with a clear separation of concerns
Built RESTful APIs with authentication and basic access control
Applied structured data modeling and version control best practices

projects.title: Personal Automation Tool
bullets: Developed a small automation script to streamline repetitive tasks
Focused on code readability, maintainability, and documentation
Practiced modular design and error handling
Provided technical support and troubleshooting for systems and network-related issues
Assumed operational coordination responsibilities on multiple occasions, organizing tasks and prioritizing incidents
Communicated technical problems clearly to both technical and non-technical stakeholders

education.title: Associate Degree in Systems Analysis and Development
